title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.0 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.0 - Applicability

State Regulations

Every railroad corporation and every other corporation, partnership or person covered by the provisions of section
72
of the Railroad

Law are hereby directed and required to obey and comply with the rules and
regulations herein adopted and prescribed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
922.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
